details:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix l2cap_global_chan_by_psm regression

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 8422e81ff42d996e397dd413634a026af3169b27, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit d0be8347c623e0ac4202a1d4e0373882821f56b0. For more details please see the references link.
